title: Verify whether the IPV4 address gets sync to proxy when we provide both IPv4 & IPv6 address/CIDR/Ranges configured in a single network location
custom_steps:
1. Use the REST APIS for both IPv4 & IPv6 address/CIDR/Ranges configured in a single network location
2. This is allowed in the Webui, same should be supported with REST APIs
custom_expected:
1. Only IPv4,IPv6 and CIDR range  should be synced.
2. Verify that both IPV4 and ipv6 addresses can be configured through REST APIs
